title: Senior Frontend Developer
description: Joined Vorksol as a ReactJS Developer, where I contributed to building scalable, user-friendly web applications. My role involves crafting responsive interfaces, integrating APIs, and ensuring seamless performance while adhering to best practices in front-end development.

title: Frontend Developer
description: As a Frontend Engineer, I specialize in building user-friendly, responsive web applications using modern technologies like JavaScript, React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Redux Toolkit. I focus on creating high-performance, scalable, and maintainable code while ensuring seamless user experiences across all devices. My work involves collaborating closely with backend developers, designers, and stakeholders to deliver high-quality software solutions that meet business objectives and enhance user satisfaction.

title: Junior Web Developer
description: Started my career building modern web applications and learning industry best practices. Contributed to various projects and gained valuable experience.
